bool mIsSolid

Detailed Description

Base class for style handlers. All custom styles should derive from here and overload the appropriate method (either color() or generate_span(...), depending on how the style is to be rendered.

Member Data Documentation

bool AggOO::StyleHandler::mIsSolid [protected]

Indicates if the style is a solid color. This is an optimization, and provides little other use (generate_span could do the same thing, but would be overkill.)
